price: যিসকলে কুফুৰী কৰিছে, দেশ-বিদেশলৈ সিহঁতৰ অবাধ বিচৰণে যেন তোমাক বিচলিত নকৰে।
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
